resources.string: Place your phone beside your leg with screen facing inwards. Then wait for the vibration and draw.

Singleplayer:
 1. Select "Play" in the main menu
 2. Hold your device against your thigh, screen facing inwards
 3. When your device vibrates point it forwards, fast and straight, as if you're drawing a pistol
 4. A scorescreen will appear, displaying your score based on how fast and accurate your draw was.
 5. Choose whether to save your score (enter a name and press "save score") or to return to main menu.
 
 Multiplayer:
 1. Select"Duel" in the main menu
 2. If the app asks for permission to use bluetooth, press "Allow"
 3. Press "scan" to discover nearby devices, tap the name/id of your opponents device, press "connect" and the game round will then automatically start 
 Highscore and score-history:
 1. Select"Highscore" in the main menu
 2. Your highscore will be displayed at the top of your screen and a list of all your scores beneath it
 
 Press Back on your device at any time in order to return to the main menu.
